hotel_data.name: Club Wyndham Canterbury
hotel_data.hotel_description: Located within 2.5 miles of Fisherman’s Wharf and Ghirardelli Square, this hotel offers spacious suites with fully equipped kitchenettes and free WiFi. A gym and business centre are also located on site. A living room with a sofa bed and a cable TV is furnished in all suites at Club Wyndham Canterbury. The modern rooms feature bright color accents and include a large bathroom with bath amenities. The San Francisco Wyndham Canterbury offers a game room with billiards for guest use. Meeting rooms are also available on site. Alcatraz Cruises and the Aquarium of the Bay are each less than 3 miles from this hotel. Golden Gate Bridge is about 4 miles away.

hotel_data.name: Best Western Plus Bayside Hotel
hotel_data.hotel_description: This bay front Oakland hotel offers Free WiFi and a hot full breakfast. A cable/satellite TV, microwave and small refrigerator are featured in each room at the 100% non-smoking Best Western Plus Bayside Hotel. A private bathroom with soaking tub, glass-enclosed shower, bathrobe and hairdryer is provided. A 24-hour front desk with multilingual staff and business center are available for guest convenience. A fitness center is located on site. The Oakland-Alameda County Coliseum and Oakland Arena are 5 miles away. Oakland International Airport is 8 miles away. Union Square in San Francisco is 13 miles away.
